channel.title: zend network on Daniel Berstein
channel.description: Recent content in zend network on Daniel Berstein

item.title: Recommendation :: Oded Rabani
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description: Daniel is known as an extremely responsible employee and demonstrated a very high level of dedication while completing his tasks. Daniel is a VERY social person and is loved by all his colleagues. We used to work together planning the new software update mechanism of Zend Network, Daniel “jumped into the water” showing huge knowledge of how complex web based server should work, always with a smile and good advice. I wish to work with Daniel again someday.
